name: @squarespace/video-background-rendering
author: Squarespace, Inc.
description: JavaScript for rending a video background from a YouTube or Vimeo URL

scripts.build: npm run lint && babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.test: webpack ./dist/index.js ./test/test.js --output-filename ./test/testBundle.js && echo +++ open ./test/testResults.html for test results
scripts.test:watch: webpack --watch ./dist/index.js ./test/test.js --output-filename ./test/testBundle.js && echo +++ open ./test/testResults.html for test results
scripts.watch: npm run lint && babel src --watch --out-dir dist
